functionLineMoreThanLimit.content:
{

  [self.nextPaymentsTableView
                 registerNib:[UINib
                                 nibWithNibName:NSStringFromClass(
                                                    [IPFNextPaymentCell class])
                                         bundle:nil]
      forCellReuseIdentifier:[IPFNextPaymentCell cellIdentifier]];
  [self.nextPaymentsTableView
                 registerNib:
                     [UINib nibWithNibName:
                                NSStringFromClass(
                                    [IPFNextPaymentHeaderTableViewCell class])
                                    bundle:nil]
      forCellReuseIdentifier:kNextPaymentHeaderCellId];
  [self.nextPaymentsTableView
                 registerNib:
                     [UINib nibWithNibName:
                                NSStringFromClass(
                                    [IPFNextPaymentErrorTableViewCell class])
                                    bundle:nil]
      forCellReuseIdentifier:kNextPaymentErrorCellId];
}
